dict.acceptation: 目录，一览表；（美）大学情况便览；展览目录；产品样本；
为…编目录；登记分类；记载，列入目录；登记（某人、某事的）详情；

sent.orig: The Americans cut back the word "catalogue" and it became "catalog".
sent.trans: 美国人把catalogue这个词加以缩短，成了catalog。

sent.orig: There are two catalogue, the author catalogue and the subject catalogue.
sent.trans: 有两种目录：作者目录和主题目录。

sent.orig: A union catalogue is the combined catalogue of the book stocks of various libraries or branches.
sent.trans: 联合目录是许多种图书馆及其分馆所藏图书的联合目录。

sent.orig: The catalogue gives a list of advertisers.
sent.trans: 该目录列出广告客户的名单。

sent.orig: I have received your full set catalogue. I am very interested in your products.
sent.trans: 我已收到贵公司所提供的整份目录。我对贵公司的产品非常感兴趣。
